One reservation about a presidential bid that Mr. Mike Pence has expressed in private meetings is whether he can raise the money to compete with the well-funded Mitt Romney . But Mr. Benko said that shouldn't be a hindrance. If Mike Pence runs, the money will follow in a big way, he said. Mr. Mike Pence has told friends that he will make a decision by the end of the month. To read more stories like this one, please subscribe to Copyright 2011 Dow Jones

Het was mij Bill Gates snel duidelijk dat Eric Schmidt en Larry toen niet op dezelfde golflengte zaten , meent de analist. Hij voegt daaraan toe niet te verwachten dat Eric Schmidt nog lang in zijn nieuwe rol zal functioneren. Van Page wordt in de komende jaren verwacht dat hij Google niet alleen op consumentenvlak

form You saw the filibuster, now read the book. The 8 1/2- hour speech given by Sen. Bernie Sanders , I-Vt., on Dec. 10 decrying proposed tax cuts is being published by Nation Books as The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class, Sen. Bernie Sanders announced Wednesday. The book is to become available in mid-February, while an e-book edition will be available Jan. 28, Nation Books said in a news release. said Cecile Mike Pence , president of the Planned Parenthood Federation of America. Eric Cantor said Republicans are trying to make good on a "Pledge to America" promise by cutting taxpayer funding for abortion. This is also consistent with reducing spending in Washington, Eric Cantor said during his weekly meeting with reporters. Should Republicans attach abortion language to must-pass legislation, Barbara Boxer Richard Blumenthal ( D-Conn.) said, Democrats must be ready to shine a light on political gamesmanship.
